parks.name: Universal's Volcano Bay
parks.subtitle: Your Guide to a Carb-Conscious Day at the Water Park

menuItems.name: Kohola Chicken Sandwich
menuItems.description: Tandoori marinated chicken, cucumber mango basil slaw, with avocado mayo on a toasted Hawaiian style bun.

menuItems.name: Smoked Hawaiian Ribs
menuItems.description: Sticky and sweet slow smoked honey glazed ribs served with french fries, sweet plantains and cucumber mango basil slaw.

menuItems.name: Reka Burger
menuItems.description: Pepper Jack cheese, bacon, caramelized onions, topped with bread and butter pickles and BBQ sauce, on a King's Hawaiian Roll.

menuItems.name: Hawaiian Longboard Pizza
menuItems.description: Topped with sweet caramelized pineapple, savory diced ham, and spicy pickled jalapeños.

menuItems.name: Jerk Shrimp Mac and Cheese
menuItems.description: Jamaican jerk-spiced pan-seared shrimp tossed with pasta shells in a creamy white cheddar cheese sauce.

menuItems.name: Island BBQ Chicken Pizza
menuItems.description: 12-inch flatbread with mango BBQ sauce drizzled on top of diced chicken.

menuItems.name: Quinoa Edamame Burger
menuItems.description: Plant-based quinoa and edamame patty on a toasted bun with fresh toppings.

menuItems.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Beef patty with bacon, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

menuItems.name: Chicken Teriyaki Rice Bowl
menuItems.description: Teriyaki chicken over coconut jasmine rice with ginger soy dressed mixed greens, wakame seaweed, pickled cucumber and edamame salad.

menuItems.name: Shrimp Rice Bowl
menuItems.description: Seasoned shrimp over coconut jasmine rice with ginger soy dressed mixed greens, wakame seaweed, pickled cucumber and edamame salad.

menuItems.name: Chick'n Katsu Rice Bowl
menuItems.description: Breaded and fried chicken cutlet over coconut jasmine rice with ginger soy dressed mixed greens, wakame seaweed, pickled cucumber and edamame salad.

menuItems.name: Chicken Tenders
menuItems.description: Breaded and fried chicken tenders served with fries.

menuItems.name: Tropical Burger
menuItems.description: Beef patty with tropical toppings on a toasted bun, served with fries.

menuItems.name: Pretzel Dog
menuItems.description: All-beef hot dog wrapped in soft pretzel dough.

menuItems.name: Fresh Fruit Salad
menuItems.description: Seasonal fresh fruit medley.

menuItems.name: Poke Poke Bowl
menuItems.description: Fresh diced ahi tuna with rice, edamame, seaweed salad, and a sesame soy dressing.

menuItems.name: Taco Sampler
menuItems.description: Assorted tacos with a variety of fillings and fresh toppings.

menuItems.name: Nachos
menuItems.description: Tortilla chips topped with cheese sauce, jalapeños, pico de gallo, and sour cream.

menuItems.name: Volcano Boba
menuItems.description: Pineapple juice, coconut water, and blue curacao with mango boba pearls.

menuItems.name: Volcano Lava Chocolate Cake
menuItems.description: Chocolate cake that erupts with molten chocolate, inspired by the park's Krakatau volcano.

menuItems.name: Waturi Fusion Ice Cream
menuItems.description: Colorful swirls of banana, blue raspberry, strawberry and orange ice cream flavors.
